title: CEPPA St Andrews

title: Kenneth Roth
subtitle:
Aung San Suu Kyi says she'll cooperate in making it safe for Rohingya refugees to return home but it's "complex." Here are some simple steps:
1. Grant them citizenship.
2. Stop restrictions on them.
3. Prosecute the perpetrators of atrocities against them. https://trib.al/7dFVLf1 pic.twitter.com/f1MznZ3n7F
